CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Interested'), "", IF( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Not Interested'), "", IF( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'pending'), "", IF( Request_Age__c < 1, "Low", IF(Request_Age__c < 2,"Medium", "High")))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Low= Request age <24h / Medium=Request Age = 24h / High= Request age > = 48h Status pending => No urgency
CustomField.label: Urgency
